name: Slidewinder
description:
Slidewinder is an endless scrolling game that you can play until you get hit by the blocks that are falling onto you. The Position of the Blocks is randomly generated everytime a new wave of blocks spawns. The Player uses the Motion Controls of his smartphone to control his Avatar in two different directions to try and dodge Obstacles. As time goes by new waves of blocks spawn faster and the game gets harder and harder. 

The Scoring system is time-based: the longer you survive, the more Points you get.
